channel.title: No Players?
channel.description: I'm having a problem. Well, you see, I posted my status on mopar, and I uploaded my client to uppit. BUT the only problem is, I check on uppit on my download page, i get a lot of downloads like 20. But, the only thing is, People arent even joining! Well, I only get a few people on, Like, i only got like 10 created accs out of 40 downloads. It just doesnt make sense... is there something wrong with my client? Please help ... I'm using Dannyscape V4 Source. And also another question, if the problem is that 30~ MB is too high to download, Can you guide me on how to make it so more people will download it? THANKS.

item.title: No Players?
item.dc:creator: @bludgeoned bludgeoned
item.description:
@bludgeoned wrote:

I’m having a problem.
Well, you see, I posted my status on mopar, and I uploaded my client to uppit.
BUT the only problem is, I check on uppit on my download page, i get a lot of downloads like 20. But, the only thing is, People arent even joining! Well, I only get a few people on, Like, i only got like 10 created accs out of 40 downloads. It just doesnt make sense… is there something wrong with my client? Please help … I’m using Dannyscape V4 Source.
And also another question, if the problem is that 30~ MB is too high to download, Can you guide me on how to make it so more people will download it? THANKS.

Read full topic
